title: AWS CloudWatch Metrics
description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the AWS CloudWatch Metrics source.

tag_key.title: Tag Key
tag_key.description: Key of the tag. If both key and value are provided, a tag will be associated to metrics definitions/values.

should_tag_definition.title: Tag Definition
should_tag_definition.description: If true, the tag will be associated to metrics definitions. Otherwise, it will be associated to metrics values.
